article_title: Since 1989, four longtime friends come together to remember their fifth
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The women have opened up their gathering to remember Nina Wiley to the public, with family friend Butch Vig providing the "boombox soundtrack."
article_metadata.author: Rob Thomas
